snippet.title: Surviving the Aftermath - Update 7: Law & Order Trailer
snippet.description:
This update introduces a brand new criminality system, and it gives you the tools to reestablish order in your Colony with Guard Posts and Gunsmiths!

Malnutrition will also add a new layer to how you plan food production for your colonists, as they now need a varied and balanced diet (so tell your kids and adults to eat their veggies AND crickets!)

Read the full patch notes: https://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/threads/update-7-law-order-patch-notes.1388490/

Read the latest Dev Diary: https://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/threads/sta-dev-diary-update-7-law-order.1388414/

You can also follow us on Social Media!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SurvivingPDX
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Surviving_PDX

For more information about the game, visit www.survivingtheaftermath.com
